disclaimerText: This forecast is intended to provide information on expected pollution levels in areas of significant public exposure. It may not apply in very specific locations close to unusually strong or short-lived local sources of pollution.

currentForecast.forecastSummary: Low air pollution forecast valid from Tuesday 29 March to end of Wednesday 30 March GMT
currentForecast.forecastText: Air is expected to arrive from the North Sea throughout the day, giving cloudy conditions for most, with a slim chance of showery rain in places. Light winds, but feeling colder than recently. <br/><br/>Overall air pollution is expected to remain 'Low' throughout the forecast period for the following pollutants:<br/><br/>Nitrogen Dioxide<br/>Ozone<br/>PM10 Particulate<br/>PM2.5 Particulate<br/>Sulphur Dioxide<br/><br/>

currentForecast.forecastSummary: Low air pollution forecast valid from Thursday 31 March to end of Thursday 31 March GMT
